ch0127_40_mikuri/0101_0701_01_10:
Ah! Hello, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Let the fun
times begin!
ch0127_40_mikuri/0101_0701_02_10:
Allow me to guide you through a world of
magnificent illusions!
ch0127_40_mikuri/7101_0701_01_10:
My niece Lisia is working on refining her beauty
on Pasio as well.
ch0127_40_mikuri/7101_0701_02_10:
I’m keeping myself focused to make sure she
won’t surpass me.
ch0127_40_mikuri/7101_0701_03_10:
At the same time, I hope the two of us can create
a grand illusion together one day!
ch0127_40_mikuri/7102_0701_01_10: In anything, the beginning is important.
ch0127_40_mikuri/7102_0701_02_10:
But what’s more important is that you keep
reflecting on yourself, even after the beginning.
ch0127_40_mikuri/7102_0701_03_10:
Practice makes perfect! Remember the ambition
you had when you took that first step!
ch0127_40_mikuri/7103_0701_01_10: I am an elegant lover of water, but sometimes...
ch0127_40_mikuri/7103_0701_02_10:
I want to put on a passionate, explosive
performance that goes “kaboom!”
ch0127_40_mikuri/7103_0701_03_10:
Along with my partner Pokémon, Blacephalon,
that is!
ch0127_40_mikuri/7104_0701_01_10: People and Pokémon are constantly changing...
ch0127_40_mikuri/7104_0701_02_10: just like the ebb and flow of water.
ch0127_40_mikuri/7104_0701_03_10:
I feel this firsthand watching you all grow day
by day.
ch0127_40_mikuri/7105_0701_01_10:
What type of performances do you
like, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0127_40_mikuri/7105_0701_02_10:
Something that inflames you with burning passion?
Or a quiet performance that stirs your emotions?
ch0127_40_mikuri/7105_0701_03_10:
Whatever you prefer, I’m determined to live up to
your expectations!
ch0127_40_mikuri/1701_0701_01_10: Could you spare me a moment?
ch0127_40_mikuri/1701_0701_02_10: Here’s a present from me. I hope you enjoy it!
ch0127_40_mikuri/1701_0702_01_10:
Does it suit your taste? I’m happy to give you
more whenever you like.
ch0127_40_mikuri/2501_0701_01_10:
As an artist of water, I never thought I’d be
demonstrating the art of fire to others.
ch0127_40_mikuri/2501_0701_02_10:
But that made this experience even more valuable
and dazzling to me.
ch0127_40_mikuri/2501_0701_03_10: Let’s give it our all—to expand my possibilities!
ch0127_40_mikuri/2501_0702_01_10: Every day is a wonderful learning experience!
ch0127_40_mikuri/2501_0702_02_10:
Whether you’re a new Trainer or a seasoned
Champion, you should always have this mindset.
ch0127_40_mikuri/2511_0701_01_10:
Fire and water can be dangerous if used
improperly.
ch0127_40_mikuri/2511_0701_03_10:
Preparation is key if you want to avoid
any incidents!
ch0127_40_mikuri/2511_0702_01_10:
When we’re able to relax and enjoy a wonderful
production created by performers...
ch0127_40_mikuri/2511_0702_02_10:
it’s because of the many people and Pokémon who
put in the time to thoroughly prepare for it.
ch0127_40_mikuri/2511_0702_03_10: I certainly hope you remember that.
ch0127_40_mikuri/3001_0701_01_10:
The morning sun is a natural work of art shown to
us by the world itself! Oh, how wonderful!
ch0127_40_mikuri/3003_0701_01_10:
You and your Pokémon are even more beautiful
with the sun as your spotlight!
ch0127_40_mikuri/3005_0701_01_10:
Illusions created with water and fire shine even
brighter in the night sky!
